languages.text: {n}Вы выталкиваете себя из пучины боли, полностью отдаваясь голосу Кибеллы. Спустя мгновение он начинает звучать громче и яснее. Отвлекавшая вас мука никуда не исчезает, однако теперь вы знаете, куда нужно идти — и следуете за своей проводницей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы выталкиваете себя из пучины боли, полностью отдав себя голосу Кибеллы. Спустя мгновение он начинает звучать громче и яснее. Отвлекавшая вас мука никуда не исчезает, однако теперь вы знаете, куда нужно идти — и следуете за своей проводницей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы выталкиваете себя из пучины боли, полностью отдаваясь голосу Кибеллы. Спустя мгновение он начинает звучать громче и яснее. Отвлекавшая вас мука никуда не исчезает, однако теперь вы знаете, куда нужно идти — и следуете за своей проводницей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting to Kibellah's voice completely. A moment later, the sound of it becomes louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

{n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting to Kibellah's voice completely. A moment later, the sound of it becomes louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

{n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

{n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

{n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

{n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du drückst dich hinaus aus den Tiefen der Schmerzen, unterwirfst dich vollkommen Kibellahs Stimme. Einen Augenblick später wird sie lauter und deutlicher. Der verstörende Schmerz verschwindet nicht, doch nun weißt du, wohin du gehen musst — und du folgst deiner Wegweiserin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du drückst dich hinaus aus den Tiefen der Schmerzen, unterwirfst dich vollkommen Kibellahs Stimme. Einen Augenblick später wird sie lauter und deutlicher. Der verstörende Schmerz verschwindet nicht, doch nun weißt du, wohin du gehen musst — und du folgst deiner Wegweisterin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te fuerzas a salir de la negrura del dolor, rindiéndote por completo a la voz de Kibellah. Un momento más tarde, empieza a volverse más sonora y clara. El dolor desorientador no desaparece, pero ya sabes adónde ir, de modo que sigues a tu guía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te fuerzas a salir de la negrura del dolor, rindiéndote por completo a la voz de Kibellah. Un momento más tarde, empieza a volverse más sonora y clara. El dolor desorientador no desaparece, pero ya sabes adónde ir, de modo que sigues a tu guía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは苦痛の淵から自身を引き上げ、キベラの声に自身を完全に委ねる。ほどなくして、その声はより大きく、より明瞭になりはじめる。不快な痛みは消えないものの、どこに行けばいいのかはわかる…だからこそ、あなたはその導きに従った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは苦痛の淵から自身を引き上げ、キベラの声に自身を完全に委ねる。ほどなくして、その声はより大きく、より明瞭になりはじめる。不快な痛みは消えないものの、どこに行けばいいのかはわかる…だからこそ、あなたはその導きに従った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从痛苦之中抽身而出，完全遵循绮贝菈的声音前进。过了一会儿，她的声音变得更加响亮，更加清晰。尽管令人难受的痛楚并没有消失，但你已经知道该去什么地方了。你跟随指引，向前走去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从痛苦之中抽身而出，完全遵循绮贝菈的声音前进。过了一会儿，她的声音变得更加响亮，更加清晰。尽管令人难受的痛楚并没有消失，但你已经知道该去什么地方了。你跟随指引，向前走去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous enfoncez dans les profondeurs de la souffrance et vous soumettez à la voix de Kibellah. Un instant plus tard, elle se fait plus claire, plus sonore. La douleur demeure, mais vous savez désormais où aller. Vous suivez votre guide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous enfoncez dans les profondeurs de la souffrance et vous soumettez à la voix de Kibellah. Un instant plus tard, elle se fait plus claire, plus sonore. La douleur demeure, mais vous savez désormais où aller. Vous suivez votre guide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Acının derinliklerinden çıkmak için kendini zorluyorsun. Kendini tamamen Kibellah'nın sesine bırakıyorsun. Bir süre sonra ses, daha da yüksek ve net çıkmaya başlıyor. Huzursuz eden acı yok olmasa da artık nereye gideceğini biliyorsun ve... Kılavuzunu takip ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You push yourself out of the depths of pain, submitting completely to Kibellah's voice. A moment later, it starts to become louder and clearer. The disturbing pain does not disappear, but now you know where to go — and you follow your guide.{/n}
